Text.text: All Sponsoring will be used directly and only for the event!
In the very desirable, yet unlikely, case of excess (all event needs paid for), we'll donate the remainder to a charity.

StandardListItem.title: Silver Sponsor
StandardListItem.description: your logo will appear on this (awesome UI5-) conference website, showing your support for CAP! Plus you'll be mentioned in the intro/outro. Several times.

StandardListItem.title: Gold Sponsor
StandardListItem.description: all of above -Silver Sponsor- PLUS display opportunity on-site: stand-up display, info material, stickers, you name it.

Text.text: For details on how to obtain above status, please contact us via Twitter (@reCAP_conf), the Slack channel (#recap2020), or any SAP mentor/champion!
